snippet: Cumanda Kollaris, who works at a hair salon, received Neediest Cases money to enroll in a colorist course to develop further as a stylist.
abstract: Community Service Society, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Neediest Cases Fund, helps Cumanda Kollaris with her beauty school tuition.
lead_paragraph: Cumanda Kollaris, who works at a hair salon, received Neediest Cases money to enroll in a colorist course to develop further as a stylist.

headline.main: Helping a Queens Woman With Professional Development
headline.print_headline: Receiving Some Help to Enhance a Career
